    Class AutoResetStream

    Decorates a System.IO.Stream instance to support auto-rewind after read/write access.

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    System.MarshalByRefObject
    System.IO.Stream
    AutoResetStream
    Implements
    System.IDisposable
    Inherited Members

    Syntax
    public class AutoResetStream : Stream, IDisposable

    Constructors

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    AutoResetStream()

    Default constructor. Creates an instance where the BaseStream is set to a System.IO.MemoryStream.

    Declaration
    public AutoResetStream()
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    AutoResetStream(Stream)

    Constructor which accepts the System.IO.Stream instance to decorate in order to extend its behavior.

    Declaration
    public AutoResetStream(Stream baseStream)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.IO.Stream baseStream

    The System.IO.Stream instance to decorate in order to extend its behavior.
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    AutoResetStream(Stream, Boolean)

    Constructor which accepts the System.IO.Stream instance to decorate in order to extend its behavior.

    Declaration
    public AutoResetStream(Stream baseStream, bool leaveDecoratedStreamOpen)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.IO.Stream baseStream

    The System.IO.Stream instance to decorate in order to extend its behavior.
    System.Boolean leaveDecoratedStreamOpen

    When set to true the decorated underlying System.IO.Stream will be disposed or closed too, if the AutoResetStream is disposed or closed.
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    AutoResetStream(Stream, SeekOrigin, Boolean)

    Constructor which accepts the System.IO.Stream instance to decorate in order to extend its behavior.

    Declaration
    public AutoResetStream(Stream baseStream, SeekOrigin resetOrigin, bool leaveDecoratedStreamOpen)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.IO.Stream baseStream

    The System.IO.Stream instance to decorate in order to extend its behavior.
    System.IO.SeekOrigin resetOrigin

    The origin to which the stream should be reset to.
    System.Boolean leaveDecoratedStreamOpen

    When set to true the decorated underlying System.IO.Stream will be disposed or closed too, if the AutoResetStream is disposed or closed.

    | Improve this Doc View Source

    BaseStream

    The decorated System.IO.Stream instance which will be extended.

    Declaration
    public Stream BaseStream { get; set; }
    Property Value
    Type Description
    System.IO.Stream

    An instance of type System.IO.Stream. This instance will be decorated to extend the default System.IO.Stream features and behaviors.

    IsDisposingDecoratedStream

    Gets whether the decorated underlying System.IO.Stream will be closed or disposed when the AutoResetStream instance is closed or disposed. Use constructor to set the value in order to configure the behavior.

    Reset(SeekOrigin)

    Resets the System.IO.Stream.Position to an offset of '0' relative to the provided seekOrigin.

    Declaration
    public void Reset(SeekOrigin seekOrigin = SeekOrigin.Current)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.IO.SeekOrigin seekOrigin

    The optional relative position of the System.IO.Stream to apply the zero offset to. The default is System.IO.SeekOrigin.Begin.
    | Improve this Doc View Source
